name: Get to Z
description:
Can you get to Z?

Merge the letters to get towards the end goal of a Z tile, in this 2048 variation.

Keep moving the letter tiles around the board and build your score.

Move the tiles by swiping up, down, left or right. Or use the arrow keys.

Play on grid sizes of 3x3 all the way up to 10x10.

Undo action available to reply your last move.

Save and Load your game, so that you can play again later!

Good Luck!
